abstract: No institution better illustrates what would — and would not — change under this era’s regulatory overhaul than JPMorgan Chase, the figurative heir to the mighty House of Morgan.
snippet: No institution better illustrates what would — and would not — change under this era’s regulatory overhaul than JPMorgan Chase, the figurative heir to the mighty House of Morgan.
lead_paragraph: Not since the Great Depression, when the mighty House of Morgan was cleaved in two, have Washington lawmakers rewritten the rules for Wall Street as extensively as they did on Friday.

headline.main: Rules May Hit Every Corner of JPMorgan
